import React from 'react'; import './HomePage.css'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faFacebook, faTwitter } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; function HomePage({ translations, language }) { const handleLearnMoreClick = () => { window.location.href = '/about';//learn more }; return (

{translations.welcome}

  • {translations.news}

); } export default HomePage;
